title: Bug: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When working with binary projects, I am unable to access the scoped type hierarchy. The error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'' appears. I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. Additionally, I am unsure about the meaning of this error message.
OB: When trying to access the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant), I receive the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'
EB: I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars when accessing the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project. As for the error message, I would like an explanation of its meaning.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant) and try to access the scoped type hierarchy. The error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'' should appear.
